title: FARC suspends campaign over safety concerns
text:
FARC suspends campaign over safety concerns 1:12am IST - 01:25 
Colombia's former rebel group, now a political party, on Friday temporarily suspended its presidential and legislative campaigns after angry protests disrupted their campaign stops   
Colombia's former rebel group, now a political party, on Friday temporarily suspended its presidential and legislative campaigns after angry protests disrupted their campaign stops  //in.reuters.com/video/2018/02/09/farc-suspends-campaign-over-safety-conce?videoId=399891469&videoChannel=13423
